column1: '''''Nevbosh''''' (New Non Sense) is a language created in the 1910s by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his cousin [[Mary Incledon]] (1895-1940).

column2: Tolkien and Mary "collaborated to invent [this] new and more sophisticated language".<ref>{{HM|Bio}}
column4: Tolkien himself  told that his role in the construction of Nevbosh was more humble; he merely contributed to the vocabulary and influenced the spelling.<ref>{{HM|MC}}
